classification_data.text: Julio César Suaza Contador Público EL SUSCRITO CONTADOR PÚBLICO JULIO CÉSAR SUAZA, IDENTIFICADO CON LA CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA No. 14.963.157 DE SANTIAGO DE CALI Y TARJETA PROFESIONAL No. 9881-T C E R T I F I C A Q U E: 1°.) A la fecha, la composición Accionaria de la sociedad MEGASERVICIOS DE INGENIERÍA S.A.S., con NIT: 805.031.602 – 7, es de 2.000 acciones con un valor nominal de $ 50.000 cada acción, para un: CAPITAL AUTRIZADO $ 800.000.000 CAPITAL SUSCRITO $ 704.200.000 CAPITAL PAGADO $ 430.000.000 [THIS IS TABLE: Shareholding composition table with columns for ACCIONISTA, VR. ACCIÓN, PARTICIPACIÓN ACCIONARIA, NÚMERO DE ACCIONES] ACCIONISTA VR. ACCIÓN PARTICIPACIÓN NÚMERO DE ACCIONARIA ACCIONES DORA MATILDE TREJOS 50.000 50% 7.042 PUERTA, C.C. 31.953.854 JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR 50.000 50% 7.042 WELSCH, C.C. 16.733.280 TOTAL 14.084 2°.) Este certificado se expide por solicitud expresa del señor JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR WELSCH, representante Legal de MEGASERVICIOS INGENIERIA S.A.S., NIT: 805.031.602 – 7, para trámites legales, comerciales y/o bancarios. Para constancia de los anterior, se firma en la ciudad de Cali, a los veintitrés (23) días del mes de septiembre de dos mil veinte (2020). [Signature] JULIO CÉSAR SUAZA Revisor Fiscal T. P. No. 9881 – T E-Mail: julicesuа@gmail.com Móvil: 315 962850 Cel. 315 496 2860 E-mail julicesuа@hotmail.com Cali Colombia

content.thinking: Let me analyze this document step by step following the classification workflow. 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** The document contains substantial text in Spanish. I can see it's a certificate issued by "Julio César Suaza" who is a "Contador Público" (Public Accountant). The document contains information about the shareholding composition (composición accionaria) of a company called "MEGASERVICIOS DE INGENIERÍA S.A.S." with details about shares, capital, and percentage participation. 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** - BLANK: No, there is substantial content - LINK_ONLY: No, this is not a document with hyperlinks/URLs 3. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** What is the MAIN PURPOSE of this document? - This document is clearly showing the shareholding composition of a company (MEGASERVICIOS DE INGENIERÍA S.A.S.) - It shows percentage participation (50% each for two shareholders) - It shows number of shares (7,042 each) - It shows capital information - This points to ACC category 4. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** - The document is issued by "Julio César Suaza" who is identified as "Contador Público" (Public Accountant) - This is NOT issued by a tax authority like DIAN - This is NOT issued by a Chamber of Commerce - This appears to be issued by a professional accountant, likely on behalf of or for the company - This supports ACC classification 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** Looking at the content: - This is NOT a personal identification document (CECRL) - This is NOT a commercial registry certificate from Chamber of Commerce (CERL) - This IS clearly showing shareholding composition with percentages, number of shares, and capital information (ACC indicative) - This is NOT a tax registration document from DIAN (RUT) - This is NOT a beneficiary registration document from DIAN (RUB) The document contains: I verify the shareholding details, confirming a precise breakdown of ownership for MEGASERVICIOS DE INGENIERÍA S.A.S. The certificate provides critical information about shareholder participation, including equal 50% stakes and specific share allocations. A professional accountant's certification validates the accuracy of these corporate ownership details.
